sect1.title: Version 6.0.0 release candidate 1 (2018-12-10)
sect1.para: This is a major update. The following major new features were added:

listitem.para: Audio: added support for surround speaker setups (e.g. used by Windows 10 Build 1809)
Storage: added utility vboximg-mount on OS X to access the content of disk images on the host.

sect1.para: In addition, the following items were fixed or added:

listitem.para: Linux Additions: fix for building vboxvideo on EL 7.6 standard kernel, contributed by Robert Conde (bug #18093)
Shared folders: performance improvements

sect1.title: Version 6.0.0_BETA3 (2018-11-30)
sect1.para: This is a beta release. The following major new features were added:

listitem.para: OCI integration: exporting a VM is now possible from the command line interface (VBoxManage)
OCI integration: all virtualized shapes are supported, e.g. VM.Standard2.*
Devices/graphics: enable support for VMSVGA graphics device emulation by default
VBoxManage: support for DHCP options
Windows guests: support VMSVGA in the Windows Additions

sect1.para: In addition, the following items were fixed and/or added:

listitem.para: Serial: allow changing the serial port attachment while the VM is running (bug #6115)
Linux hosts: support Linux 4.20 (thank you Larry Finger)
Linux guests: support Linux 4.20 (thank you Larry Finger)
Linux guests: support VMSVGA in the Linux and X11 Additions

sect1.title: Version 6.0.0_BETA2 (2018-11-15)
sect1.para: This is a beta release. The following major new features were added:

listitem.para: User interface: a new file manager enabling user to control the guest file system and copy file objects between host and guest.

sect1.para: In addition, the following items were fixed and/or added:

listitem.para: Oracle Cloud integration fixes and improvements
User interface: many improvements
Audio/Video recording fixes and improvements
Devices: new BusLogic ISA variant
Devices: serial port fixes
BIOS: fixes
API: transparently resize disk images when merging if possible
Solaris: installer fixes
Windows Guest Additions: fix incorrect tablet co-ordinate handling with recent Windows 10 builds
Guest Additions: improved shared folder auto-mounting
OS/2 Guest Additions: initial shared folder support

sect1.title: Version 6.0.0_BETA1 (2018-10-22)
sect1.para: This is a beta release. The following major new features were added:

listitem.para: OCI Integration: implemented support for exporting a VM to Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
User interface: greatly improved HiDPI and scaling support, including better using host HiDPI support, HiDPI icons, improved detection and per-machine configuration
User interface: major rework of interface style with improved ease of access for application and machine set-up
User interface: an improved logviewer widget.
User interface: several improvements to import appliance and clone virtual machine wizards including (not limited to) enabling user to select non-default folders per machine.
User interface: a new floppy disk creation widget enabling user to create/add a (optionally formatted) floppy disk.
User interface: a new media selection widget enabling the user to select one of the already known media or select a disk image file.

sect1.para: In addition, the following items were fixed and/or added:

listitem.para: User interface: video and audio recording can now be separately enabled
Audio: implemented support for attaching / detaching VRDE audio drivers at runtime
Guest Control: various new APIs and features were implemented (see SDK documentation for more)
Networking: Added a workaround for older guests which do not enable bus mastering for the virtio PCI device
iSCSI: In cases where there is no ambiguity, the LUN of an iSCSI target is automatically determined; this makes eases the use of iSCSI targets with LUNs other than zero
ACPI: Up to four custom ACPI tables can now be configured for a VM
